SeoExpert.title: Job description
SeoExpert.des: We are looking for an SEO expert to manage all search engine optimization and marketing activities.
Responselist: Perform SEO Audits using tools like Screaming Frog (Paid Version), Sitebulb or any other Crawling
Resolve Audit Issues Individually and with the help of a web developer
Perform various On-Page Optimization activities like the meta title and descriptions, heading tags, schema code, etc
Create Detailed Content Briefs for Content Writers
Setup Google Analytics, Google Tag Manager and Google Webmaster Account
Requirementlist: Understanding of How Google Search Works i.e. the concept of crawling, indexing and Self-driven and passionate about SEO
Hands of Experience of Tools like Screaming Frog (Paid Version) or Sitebulb or any other paid Crawling Tool, WordPress SEO Plugins like Yoast SEO or Rank Math, etc
Experience of working on an Ecommerce Website will be an added advantage
Excellent at Written and Verbal Communication

Autotest.head: Job description
titlelist: Strong script writing experience in automation tools like Selenium and good knowledge in testing practices.
Designing and implementing Test Automation Strategy.
Experience configuring and running functional automated software tests.
Creating modular and reusable Automation frameworks with Selenium + JUnit/TestNG.
Experience in any framework like Cucumber or Date Driven.
Behavior Driven Development (BDD) framework / Test Driven Development (TDD) framework.
Strong Knowledge of AngularJS, Protractor, Maven and Charles Proxy.
Experience using JavaScript & Type Scripting (JS/TS) and knowledge of Puppeteer/Cucumber. automation for angular application is desirable JavaScript.
Designing and implementing Test Automation Strategy.
Creating modular and reusable Automation frameworks with Selenium + JUnit/TestNG automation.
Answering questions and addressing complaints of students.
Good communication skill and should be presentable.
To counsel students regarding IT courses.

text.title: Empowering progress through tech and innovation.

paragraph: As the digital landscape evolves at an unprecedented pace, businesses must reinvent themselves to stay ahead. That's where we come in – We’re Askzenix Technologies: A leading IT services company dedicated to powering your digital evolution.

At Askzenix Technologies, we understand that successful digital transformation is about more than just Technologies. It’s a holistic journey that intertwines people, processes, and seamless connectivity.

Our team of highly skilled professionals leverage cutting-edge technologies, such as cloud computing, artificial intelligence, blockchain and DevOps to drive efficiency, enhance customer experiences, and fuel business growth.

WorkContent.title: Understanding Your Needs
content: We start by thoroughly understanding your business objectives, challenges, and unique requirements.
Our dedicated team collaborates closely with you to ensure a deep understanding of your vision and goals.

WorkContent.title: Strategic Planning
content: Based on the gathered insights, we develop a comprehensive project plan that outlines the scope, timeline, and milestones.
Our planning phase is focused on creating a roadmap that aligns with your business strategy.

WorkContent.title: Agile Development Methodology
content: We follow an Agile development methodology to ensure flexibility and adaptability throughout the project lifecycle.
Regular sprint reviews and client feedback sessions keep you informed and involved in the development process.
We have team of experienced Scrum Masters, Product Owner & Business Analyst with decades of experience in diverse industries.

WorkContent.title: Experienced Development Team
content: Our team of skilled developers brings a wealth of experience in various technologies and industries.
We are committed to staying updated on the latest trends and technologies to deliver cutting-edge solutions.

WorkContent.title: Collaborative Communication
content: Transparent communication is at the heart of our working philosophy.
You'll have a dedicated Technical project manager or Scrum Master who serves as a single point of contact, providing regular updates and addressing any concerns.

WorkContent.title: Quality Assurance
content: Our rigorous quality assurance process ensures that every line of code meets the highest standards.

We conduct thorough testing at each stage to identify and address any issues before the final delivery. Our founder is having more than 12 Year Working experience in testing itself with CMM level organizations i.e Sapient, Saxo Bank, IBM & Fareportal.
We have separate QA Engineering department with more than 15+ experienced Test Analyst, Automation Test Engineer, Automation Architect, Performance Tester & Scrum Masters.

WorkContent.title: Timely Delivery
content: We understand the importance of timelines in the business world. Our team is committed to delivering projects on schedule.
Regular progress assessments and adjustments are made to ensure that deadlines are met without compromising quality.

WorkContent.title: Post-Implementation Support
content: Our commitment doesn't end with the delivery of the project. We provide ongoing support and maintenance to address any issues and ensure optimal performance.

WorkContent.title: Client Collaboration
content: We view our clients as partners. Your feedback and collaboration are essential throughout the development process.
Regular check-ins and feedback sessions ensure that the final product aligns with your expectations.

WorkContent.title: Continuous Improvement
content: We believe in continuous improvement and regularly review our processes to enhance efficiency and effectiveness.
Your input is invaluable in this process, helping us refine our approach for future projects.

Quality.title: Quality Assurance
Quality.des: Askzenix Technologies values quality and provides 100% bug free application with no compromisation in it.

Quality.title: Requirement Gathering
Quality.des: We follow the first and foremost priority of gathering requirements, resources, and information to begin our project.

Quality.title: Design
Quality.des: We create catchy and charming designs with the latest tools of designing to make it a best user-friendly experience.

Quality.title: Development
Quality.des: Development of mobile application/web/blockchain started using latest tools and technologies with transparency.

Quality.title: Deployment
Quality.des: After Trial and Following All processes, your application is ready to deploy on the live server.

Quality.title: Go-Live
Quality.des: Our company offers you all support and the team is always ready to answer every query after deployment.

Platform1.title: HomeOnline - Complete Real Estate Platform
Platform1.des: HomeOnline is our flagship real estate platform offering end-to-end property solutions with AI-driven recommendations.

Platform2.title: Agentive AI in Performance Marketing Optimization
Platform2.des: NYX was born from a vision to simplify marketing and amplify results. In a world overwhelmed by complexity, we empower brands and creators to thrive by blending the art of storytelling with the precision of AI.

Platform3.title: Enhancing Data Processing Efficiency with Agentive AI
Platform3.des: Vinebrook Homes, a leading provider of single family rental homes in the US market, sought to enhance productivity and reduce time spent on repetitive tasks. The company implemented an Agentive AI system to proactively assist employees in processing different bill formats. This case study explores the impact of the AI implementation.

Platform4.title: Agentive AI in Financial Document Processing
Platform4.des: SRGA Global, an India-based CA firm serving 300+ global clients, sought to automate their daily accounting activities. They needed an AI solution to process diverse financial documents including emails, bank statements, and invoices.

Platform5.title: DENSO - Advanced Mobility Solutions
Platform5.des: DENSO is a global company focused on advanced mobility that positively changes how the world moves and contributes to greater well-being. As a global Fortune 500 company, They have a broad product portfolio and widespread global impact.

Platform6.title: Basket.app - Grocery Delivery Platform
Platform6.des: Basket is a Jordan-based online grocery delivery service platform that allows users to order groceries from stores they love, and have them delivered at their doorstep in as little as an hour. We partnered with them from their startup phase to build their complete digital ecosystem.

Platform7.title: iOT-Hydra-Sense is an iOT application
Platform7.des: The iOT bottle provides information about how much water you should drink daily. It tracks your hydration habits and gives real-time reminders to help you stay hydrated. Designed for both Hybrid App (Flutter) platforms, it’s a smart way to improve your overall health.
